executable.title: Tube Graph Kernel (TubeTK)
executable.description: Computes a (p.d.) kernel matrix K of similarity values between two collections of input graphs. Given a list A of N graphs and a list B of M graphs, the K(i,j)-th entry of K contains the similarity value among the i-th graph of A and the j-th graph of B. K will eventually be a N x M matrix.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

file.name: argOutputKernel
file.label: Output Kernel
file.description: Basename for output kernel (will write .bin, .libsvm, .txt files).

string.name: argBasePath
string.label: Absolute Path to Graph Files
string.description: Absolute path to the graph files (optional).

string.name: argGlobalLabelFileName
string.label: Global Label File
string.description: Specify a global label file to use (optional).

integer.name: argDefaultLabelType
integer.label: Default Label Type
integer.description: If no label file is associated with graphs, or no global label file is given, this specifies the default node labeling strategy (0 ... label by node ID, 1 ... label by node degree).
